text:
Sai Mandir is well maintained and is always my go to place.

The only thing I don‚Äôt like is - during the Arati time priest sings in mic - in his own way - mostly happens on Thursday.
As usual and always they can play it in the music system rather than the priest singing it. Because he follows his own way to sing - which is really changing the peacefulness

And again after this review as well, the priest is singing .. üòí
This Sai temple is inside complex. Appreciate for those who have built the temple. On Thursdays don't worry about your meal. They make sure to give enough Prasad

This is the only sai baba worship centre in singapore. Just located at Sri Vadapathira Kaliamman amman temple, Little India. The worship centre is very disciplined and relaxing for a good chanting. Although die to covid-19 the allowed time for dharsan is 5mins for each pax. The centre is well maintained and the organizers appear little bit rude, but thats the only way to maintain the centre in an organized way. Keep on your timings as they wont allow even 1 min after the closing time.

There are 3 slots to visit if you are planning for arthi and dharshan
8:45-11:30 am, 5:30-6:10 pm, 7-8:10pm
Very well organized Temple. Do note they are very particular about not spending time inside the temple and keep asking people to leave quickly.

Few times i went to there, i feel my heart more peaceful, this place silent and peaceful no one distrubing you, weekly once u travel ocer and meet baba u feel positive energy if you have any personal issues or problem just pray and hand over to baba, he will guide u do the way how to rectify this issues. If u have possible distribute food or some visitor means helps some one. You sit at the hall and meditate or sit calm.
